name: Flame Engineering 100,000 BTU Weed Dragon Deluxe Vapor Torch Kit With Squeeze V

reviews.name: Flame Engineering VT2-23SVC 100,000 BTU Weed Dragon Deluxe Vapor Torch Kit With
reviews.reviewText: great product at a great price . i bought this to start up the fire for my bbq smoker stick burner and also used it to do my fence line , l love this thing .
reviews.title: awesome torch

reviews.name: Flame Engineering VT2-23SVC 100,000 BTU Weed Dragon Deluxe Vapor Torch Kit With
reviews.reviewText: It does the job! 3 to 10 seconds most weeds are gone from view. Be sure to have a hose at the ready. I recommend a pistol grip hose nozzle with the hose turned on. Second best have a fire extinguisher with in an arm's reach. I had my grandson fallow me with the hose to douse the ground I had scorched.
reviews.title: The Dragon did it.

reviews.name: Flame Engineering VT2-23SVC 100,000 BTU Weed Dragon Deluxe Vapor Torch Kit With
reviews.reviewText: Great Product, eliminates the need for sprays.
reviews.title: Excellent product, takes care of the weeds like a

reviews.name: Flame Engineering VT2-23SVC 100,000 BTU Weed Dragon Deluxe Vapor Torch Kit With
reviews.reviewText: This torch works fantastic! Just make sure that the ground has been watered down to help avoid unwanted smoldering embers or have a garden hose at the ready just in case of a fire. Other than this warning the weeds just don't stand a chance.
reviews.title: fANTASTIC PRODUCT
